programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Derek finally gives up on Jalan Takdir, only to learn the truth behind its purchase. James comes to the realisation that he is more similar to his father than he thought. Zara gets jealous of Adina's fondness for Rosnani.

Can Beverly get her roller coaster built, and can Hazel stop getting side tracked on her delivery with so many distractions around? Axel never fears when his lucky charm is near! But what happens when his lucky charm goes missing? Will the Pikwik Pack make their delivery to the Talent Show in time for Maddy the Rhino's first ever performance?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S7
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: When Triangle Alien Sister has trouble following Cherry's new dance routine, Ollie and friends realise she needs glasses. It's up to Cherry to show her that wearing glasses isn't so bad. But what will happen when Cherry breaks her own glasses and has to perform her dance routine without them? The Shifty Squares are opening a new Winter Wonderland in the middle of Ollipolis and everyone's excited.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe S2
programme.desc: Animated series about a fairy and her adventures running a neighborhood cafe with her friends.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Top Wing S2
programme.desc: Four young birds - Penny, Rod, Swift, and Brody - become new Top Wing cadets to earn their wings by helping their community.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: In this episode of his journey, Luke continues in Hoi An where vibrant markets are bustling and magnificent produce is on offer for him to cook with.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S11
programme.desc: Martha Stewart is back with an incredible 11th series of Martha Bakes, packed with mouthwatering pies, impressive cakes and the most delicious cookies. Martha is passionate about using the best ingredients possible, and in this series, we'll join her for a lesson with the experts who grow and produce the key ingredients that every baker needs to take their food from ordinary to extraordinary.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: James finally calls Derek out on his selfishness over the years and talks him into taking real responsibility for his actions. Meanwhile, Jessica and Adam grow closer.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Lauren plots to get back at Eddie for humiliating her in class the previous week, while Eddie thinks he has taught Lauren a lesson when he catches her paying another student to do her homework. But to Eddie's surprise, Mrs Pereira comes confronting him with a grave accusation.

programme.title: Xavier Riddle And The Secret Museum S1
programme.desc: Come along with Xavier Riddle, the most effusive pint-sized history adventurer; Yadina, his effervescent little sister; and his brilliant best friend Brad, as they unravel the secrets of world famous heroes from history!

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: The Animal Rescue team fights the crawling megabeast. The megabeast drools saliva that has poison in it. BM Corp is using this poison to kill trees to develop the Amazon river. Will the Animal Rescue Team be able to stop the BM Corp and rescue the megabeast animal?

programme.title: Nature Cat S2
programme.desc: Join Fred the Nature Cat and his animal friends for more mini adventures in the great outdoors, once his human family leaves for the day!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings' clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger's collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, it's a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: After the Novas help expose Aubrina for her wrongdoing and have the Star Dust Crystal returned, they're ready to make their first Star Dust jump' and explore parts of space that humanity has never seen before. Aubrina, meanwhile, isn't going down without a fight, and enlists a shadowy figure to stop the Novas at all costs!

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S1
programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: Exlosers S4
programme.desc: Clan visits Cheryl at her bungalow, and she made an offer to him that he finds it hard to refuse. The gang is shocked to see that Mundi back at the tuition center. Leonard and Justin have a falling out with Daryl and Janice. They can't get over the fact that they are still ordinary kids compared to them. When Ava and William changed to be more confident after attending that special enrichment class, Leonard and Justin decide to do the same thing.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal USA S5

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38
programme.desc: This gameshow features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S2
programme.desc: The Masked Singer is a singing competition guessing game based on the Korean format King of Mask Singer. The performers are celebrities wearing elaborate head to toe costumes to conceal their identities from the host, panelists, audience, and other contestants.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Jessica is spooked when Derek tells Adam to invite Arissa over for a visit. Shen Yang and Ella try to help Ah Yoke get over her break up with Matthew.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: (重) 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、被驱逐、被打击，但她都一一挺过来，最后重振已衰败的家族生意.
